Game

Class GameServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • Game.GameServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/Game.GameServlet")
public class GameServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    This is the main Servlet class that handles Player actions and requests. This class interacts directly and mostly with Game page class and perform many actions like RollDice, BuyProperty etc.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
